section.title: Using MongoMaxKey as a value
section.programlisting:
<?php

$collection->insert(array("task" => "dishes", "do by" => new MongoMaxKey));
$collection->insert(array("task" => "staff meeting", "do by" => new MongoDate(strtotime("+4 days"))));

$cursor = $collection->find()->sort(array("do by" => 1));

?>
section.para: The cursor will contain the staff meeting document, then the dishes document. The dishes document will always be returned last, regardless of what else is added to the collection (unless other documents are added with MongoMaxKey in the "do by" field).
